review: I am currently on bedrest and this has been a lifesaver for me!  I can plug it into any TV in the house with an HDMI port and it streams quickly.  I am an Amazon prime customer so all my music is available also.  I also belong to Netflix and can watch movies and TV shows straight from the app.  All you have to do is download it...takes just a few seconds.  The remote is easy to use and I even downloaded the remote app for the Iphone.  When I use my Iphone I also have the option to give voice commands.  All in all... great product and well worth the money! I can't believe I didn't try this sooner.
author: NickyC
